<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><b><span style="font-size:21.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">《穆赫兰道》与《内陆帝国》</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:21.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">我在多年的工程生涯中发现很多工程师碰到一个共性的问题：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">工程师很多，甚至有很多有多年工作经验，但是对一些关键概念的理解非常模糊，比如不理解</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">CPU</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、内存资源等的真正分布，具体的工作机制，这使得他们对很多问题的分析都摸不到方向。比如进程的调度延时是多少？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">能否硬实时？多核下多线程如何执行？系统的内存究竟耗到哪里去了？我写的应用程序究竟耗了多少内存？什么是内存泄漏，如何判定内存是否真的泄漏？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">CPU</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">速度、内存大小和系统性能的关联究竟是什么？内存和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">存在着怎样的千丝万缕的联系？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">若不能回答上述问题，势必造成</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">开发过程中的抓瞎，出现关键</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">bug</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和性能问题后丈二摸不着。从某种意义上来说，进程调度和内存管理之于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，类似任督两脉之于人体。任督两脉属于奇经八脉，任脉主血，为阴脉之海；督脉主气，为阳脉之海。任督两脉分别对十二正经脉中的手足六阴经与六阳经脉起着主导作用，任督通则百脉皆通。对进程调度和内存管理的理解，可以极大地打通我们对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">系统</span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://lib.csdn.net/base/16"><b><span lang="ZH-CN" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;color:#D41D28;mso-font-kerning:0pt;text-decoration:none;text-underline:
none">架构</span></b></a></span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，性能瓶颈，进程资源消耗等一系列问题的理解。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;

mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:

font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">critical section</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（该核调度被关），绿色进程</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">T2</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">时刻被中断打断，而后</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">T3</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">时刻</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">IRQ1</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">里面唤醒了红色的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">RT</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">进程（如果是硬实时</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">RTOS</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，这个时候</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">RT</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">进程应该能抢入），之后</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">IRQ1</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">后又执行了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">IRQ2</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">T4</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">时刻</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">IRQ1</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">IRQ2</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">都结束了，红色</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">RT</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">进程仍然不能执行（因为绿色进程还在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">spin_lock</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">里面），直到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">T5</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">时刻，普通进程释放</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">spin_lock</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">后，红色</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">RT</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">进程才抢入。从</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">T3</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">T5</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">要多久，<b>鬼都不知道</b>，这样就无法满足硬实时系统的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">“</span><b><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:#FB0007;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">可预期</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">延迟性，因此</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">不是硬实时操作系统。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">preempt-rt</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">补丁试图把中断、软中断线程化，变成可以被抢占的区间，而把会关本核调度器的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">spin_lock</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">替换为可以调度的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">mutex</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，它实现了在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">T3</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">时刻唤醒</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">RT</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">进程的时刻，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">RT</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">进程可以立即抢占调度进入的目标，避免了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">T3-T5</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">之间延迟的非确定性。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">CPU</span></b><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">消耗型</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> vs. I/O</span></b><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">消耗型</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">运行的进程，分为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">类，一类是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">CPU</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">消耗型（狂算），一类是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">消耗型（狂睡，等</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">），前者</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">CPU</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">利用率高，后者</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">CPU</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">利用率低。一般而言，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">消耗型任务对延迟比较敏感，应该被优先调度。比如，你正在疯狂编译</span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://lib.csdn.net/base/15"><b><span lang="ZH-CN" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;color:#D41D28;mso-font-kerning:0pt;text-decoration:none;text-underline:
none">安卓</span></b></a></span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，而等鼠标行为的用户界面老不工作（正在狂睡），但是鼠标一点，我们应该优先打断正在编译的进程，而去响应鼠标这个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，这样电脑的用户体验才符合人性。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的进程，对于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:

14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">SCHED_FIFO</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">SCHED_RR</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的策略，优先级高先执行；优先级高的睡眠了后优先级的执行；同等优先级的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">SCHED_FIFO</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">先</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">ready</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的跑到睡，后</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">ready</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的接着跑；而同等优先级的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">RR</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">则进行时间片轮转。比如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">存在如下</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">4</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">个进程，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">T1~T4</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（内核里面优先级数字越低，优先级越高）：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">RT</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的进程调度有一点</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">恶霸</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">色彩，我高优先级的没睡，低优先级的你就靠边站。但是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的绝大多数进程都不是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">RT</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的进程，而是采用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">SCHED_NORMAL</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">策略（这符合蜘蛛侠法则）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">NORMAL</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的人比较善良，我们一般用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">nice</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">来形容它们的优先级，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">nice</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">越高，优先级越低（你越</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">nice</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，就越喜欢在地铁让座，当然越坐不到座位）。普通进程的跑法，并不是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">nice</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">低的一定堵着</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">nice</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">高的（要不然还说什么</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">），它是按照如下公式进行：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">vruntime
=  pruntime * NICE_0_LOAD/ weight<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><i><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;

14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">NICE_0_LOAD</span></i><i><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是</span></i><i><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">0</span></i><i><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的进程的</span></i><i><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">weight</span></i><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">vruntime</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是进程的虚拟运行时间，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">pruntime</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">RT</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">进程都睡过去之后（有一个特例就是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">RT</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:

Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">没睡也会跑普通进程，那就是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">RT</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">加起来跑地实在太久太久，普通进程必须喝点汤了），</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">开始跑</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">NORMAL</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的，它倾向于调度</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">vruntime</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（虚拟运行时间）最小的普通进程，根据我们小学数学知识，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">vruntime</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">要小，要么分子小（喜欢睡，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">型进程，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">pruntime</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">不容易长大），要么分母大（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">nice</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">值低，优先级高，权重大）。这样一个简单的公式，就同时照顾了普通进程的优先级和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">CPU/IO</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">消耗情况。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:

  mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
  Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">然后，我们假设</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
  14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">T1</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
  mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">被调度再执行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">12</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">pruntime</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，它的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">vruntime</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">将增大</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">delta*1024/weight</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;
  mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
  minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
  mso-font-kerning:0pt">（这里</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">delta</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
  mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">12</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">weight</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">1024</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">），于是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">T1</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">vruntime</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">成为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">20</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，那么这个时候</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">vruntime</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">最小的反而是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">T2</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">19</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">），此后，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">将倾向于调度</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">T2</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（尽管</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">T2</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">nice</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">值大于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">T1</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，优先级低于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">T1</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，但是它的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">vruntime</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">现在只有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">19</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
  mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
  Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">所以，普通进程的调度，是一个综合考虑你喜欢干活还是喜欢睡和你的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">nice</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">值是多少的结果。鉴于此，我们去问一个普通进程的调度延迟究竟有多大，这个问题，本身意义就不是特别大，它完全取决于当前的系统里面还有谁在跑，取决于你唤醒的进程的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">nice</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和它前面喜欢不喜欢睡觉。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
  mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
  Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">明白了这一点，你就不会在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
  mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">里面问一些让回答的人吐血的问题。比如，一个普通进程多久被调度到？明确地说，不知道！装逼的说法，就是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">“depend on …”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;
  mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
  minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
  mso-font-kerning:0pt">，依赖的东西太多。再装逼的说法，就是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
  mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">一言难尽</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
  Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
  mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，但这也是大实话。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
  0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</tbody></table>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">分配</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">vs. </span></b><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">占据</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><b><u><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span></u></b><b><u><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">作为一个把应用程序员当傻逼的操作系统，它必须允许应用程序犯错</span></u></b><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。所以这类问题就不要问了：进程</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">malloc()</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">了内存，还没有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">free()</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">就挂了，那么我前面分配的内存没有释放，是不是就泄漏掉了？明确的说，这是不可能的，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内核如果这么傻，它是无法应付乱七八糟的各种开源有漏洞软件的，所以进程死的时候，肯定是资源皆被内核释放的，这类傻问题，你明白</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的出发点，就不会再去问了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">同样的，你在应用程序里面</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">malloc()</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">成功的一刻，也不要以为真的拿到了内存，这个时候你的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">vss</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（虚拟地址空间，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Virtual
Set Size</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）会增大，但是你的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">rss(</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">驻留在内存条上的内存，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Resident SetSize</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">)</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内存会随着写到每一页而缓慢增大。所以，分配成功的一刻，顶多只是被忽悠了，和你实际占有还是不占有，暂时没有半毛钱关系。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">如下图，最初的堆是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">8KB,</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">8KB</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">也写过了，所以堆的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">vss</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">rss</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">都是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">8KB</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。此后我们调用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">brk()</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">把堆变大到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，但是实际上它占据的内存</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">rss</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">因为第</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">页还没有写，根本没有真正从内存条上拿到内存。直到写第</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。这就是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">针对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">app</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">lazy</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">分配机制，它的出发点，当然也是防止应用程序傻逼了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">代码段的内存、堆的内存、栈的内存都是这样懒惰地拿到，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">demanding
page</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">我们有一台</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内存的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">32</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">位</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">系统，我们关闭</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">swap</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，同时透过修改</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">overcommit_memory</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">来允许申请不超过进程虚拟地址空间的内存：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">$
sudo swapoff -a<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">$
sudo sh -c 'echo 1 >/proc/sys/vm/overcommit_memory'<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;

Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">此后，我们的应用可以申请一个超级大的内存（比实际内存还大）：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">上述程序在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1GB</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的电脑上面运行，申请</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2GB</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内存可以申请成功，但是在写到一定程度后，系统出现</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">out-of-memory</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，上述程序对应的进程作为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">oom_score</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">最大（最该死的）的进程被系统杀死。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">隔离</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">vs. </span></b><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">共享</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">进程究竟耗费了多少内存，是一个非常复杂的概念，除了上面的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">vss, rss</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">外，还有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">pss</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">uss</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，这些都是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">不同于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">RTOS</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的显著特点之一。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">Linux</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">各个进程既要做到隔离，但是隔离中又要实现共享，比如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">1000</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">个进程都用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">libc</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">因为这个问题，又是一个要靠装逼来回答的问题，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“dependon…”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。坦白讲，每次当我问到老外问题，老外第一句话就是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“depend
on…”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的时候，我就想上去抽他了，但是我又抑制了这个冲动，因为，很多问题，不是简单的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">0</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-font-kerning:

0pt">“depend on …”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;

0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
